formulas.name: BillNoName
formulas.expression: '' + IF( LEN({!BillToSeqNo}) <= 2 , ( IF( LEN({!BillToSeqNo}) == 1 , '(0' + {!BillToSeqNo} + ')' , '(' + {!BillToSeqNo} + ')') ), '(' + TRIM(LEFT({!BillToSeqNo},3)) + ')' ) + '' + IF( LEN({!BillTo_City}) > 30 , TRIM(LEFT({!BillTo_City},30)) , {!BillTo_City} ) + '' + If(ISBLANK({!BillTo_State})== false , (IF( LEN({!BillTo_State}) > 15 , ',' + TRIM(LEFT({!BillTo_State},15)) , ',' + {!BillTo_State}) ) , '' )

formulas.name: FaultMessageFormula
formulas.expression: MID( {!$Flow.FaultMessage}, FIND('FIELD_CUSTOM_VALIDATION_EXCEPTION: ', {!$Flow.FaultMessage} )+34, ( LEN({!$Flow.FaultMessage} ) - (FIND('FIELD_CUSTOM_VALIDATION_EXCEPTION: ', {!$Flow.FaultMessage} )+34) ) - ( LEN({!$Flow.FaultMessage} ) - FIND('. You can look up ExceptionCode', {!$Flow.FaultMessage} ) ) )

formulas.name: MailToName
formulas.expression: '' + IF( LEN({!MailToSeqNo}) <= 2 , ( IF( LEN({!MailToSeqNo}) == 1 , '(0' + {!MailToSeqNo} + ')' , '(' + {!MailToSeqNo} + ')') ), '(' + TRIM(LEFT({!MailToSeqNo},3)) + ')' ) + '' + IF( LEN({!MailTo_City}) > 30 , TRIM(LEFT({!MailTo_City},30)) , {!MailTo_City} ) + '' + If(ISBLANK({!MailTo_State})== false , (IF( LEN({!MailTo_State}) > 15 , ',' + TRIM(LEFT({!MailTo_State},15)) , ',' + {!MailTo_State}) ) , '' )

formulas.name: shipToName
formulas.expression: '' + IF( LEN({!shipToSeqNo}) <= 2 , ( IF( LEN({!shipToSeqNo}) == 1 , '(0' + {!shipToSeqNo} + ')' , '(' + {!shipToSeqNo} + ')') ), '(' + TRIM(LEFT({!shipToSeqNo},3)) + ')' ) + '' + IF( LEN({!ShipTo_City}) > 30 , TRIM(LEFT({!ShipTo_City},30)) , {!ShipTo_City} ) + '' + If(ISBLANK({!ShipTo_State})== false , (IF( LEN({!ShipTo_State}) > 15 , ',' + TRIM(LEFT({!ShipTo_State},15)) , ',' + {!ShipTo_State}) ) , '' )
